text: Should say "Sovereign District" smh
author: awprokop

text:
What we learned today: other Trump aides and family members won't be indicted by Mueller.

What we don't yet know: what Mueller concluded about Trump himself (the person for whom indictment was not on the table).
author: awprokop

text: What if Mueller's report says that Trump was "extremely careless" but that "no reasonable prosecutor" would bring a case against him?
author: awprokop

text: Okay, it's 5 o'clock!
author: awprokop

text: Many leading conservative commentators seemed to know about Roberts's flip on Obamacare in something close to real time, according to @JoshMBlackman book "Unprecedented": https://www.amazon.com/Unprecedented-Constitutional-Challenge-Josh-Blackman/dp/1610393287 …
author: awprokop

text: Wow, congrats to @NateSilver538 for taking over ABC News
author: awprokop

text: Biden should really impress the pundits by naming John McCain as his running mate
author: awprokop

text:
One funny bit in the Cohen warrants — the FBI had the wrong hotel room for Cohen, until the day of the raids.

They luckily talked to an employee who told them it was Room 1628, not 1728. Got a new warrant
author: awprokop

text:
Good stuff from the great @kpolantz and CNN's stakeout team: Mueller prosecutors/FBI agents have made two recent visits to the courthouse on nonpublic matters 
https://www.cnn.com/2019/03/19/politics/robert-muellers-team-says-its-very-busy-this-week/index.html …
author: awprokop

text:
Lots of the stuff redacted in the Cohen search warrants is already known.

-Stormy & McDougal payments
-Communications re: Access Hollywood tape
-Cohen's communications with Trump re: "negative publicity" before election
-Cohen comms w/ AMI execs

https://www.vox.com/2018/4/12/17226314/michael-cohen-trump-raid-stormy-daniels-national-enquirer …
author: awprokop

text: I enjoy that Trump is said to have grown "increasingly confident" of this. Was he not, before? https://apnews.com/b9895c2a29924230b93a21d9b780047a …
author: awprokop

text: But good point, maybe the Ukraine thing was involved in the original Mueller request, will think about this as I read through the docs again more slowly
author: awprokop

text: Warrants say FARA was in the mix re: Essential Consultants
author: awprokop

text: Some say people can't grow and change. And then there's this: https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/a-total-loser-trump-lashes-out-at-george-conway-who-has-been-questioning-his-mental-health/2019/03/19/c81bcec0-4a43-11e9-93d0-64dbcf38ba41_story.html …
author: awprokop

text: Kinda funny that Michael Cohen may have escaped FARA charges because his "Essential Consultants" didn't do real work
author: awprokop

text: This particular warrant does not include the summer of 2016, but should remind us that Mueller surely knows whether Cohen went to Prague or not (and all signs for some time have suggested "not")
author: awprokop

text:
There were a lot of assumptions about what Mueller’s referral of Cohen stuff to SDNY meant at the time. We of course now know SCO was still looking to Cohen re: Trump Tower Moscow.

Documents back that up — Mueller only referred “certain aspects” of Cohen probe
author: awprokop

text:
This is what Mueller asked for in his warrant for Michael Cohen's email from July 18, 2017 

Included: Essential Consultants, false statements to financial institution, any foreign work
author: awprokop

text: The complete redactions of the campaign finance / hush money material in these unsealed warrants are another sign that this investigation remains very much active.
author: awprokop

text:
It appears to be SDNY, not Mueller, that decided to look into the hush money payments as a campaign finance violation. 

From April 7, 2018 — "Based on my participation in this investigation... I have learned of evidence of an additional Subject Offense" https://www.courtlistener.com/recap/gov.uscourts.nysd.499666/gov.uscourts.nysd.499666.43.6.pdf …
author: awprokop

text: Many pages about the hush money investigation still completely redacted in Cohen search warrants https://www.courtlistener.com/recap/gov.uscourts.nysd.499666/gov.uscourts.nysd.499666.43.1.pdf …
author: awprokop

text: Mueller's referral of parts of Cohen investigation to SDNY happened between 11/13/17 and 2/28/18
author: awprokop

text: Mueller got a warrant for Michael Cohen’s emails all the way back on July 18, 2017
author: awprokop

text: Nunes has found a conspiracy he's worried about. (Besides the deep state one.)
author: awprokop

text: Believe that takes us down to 10 attorneys working under Mueller
author: awprokop

text: Lincoln did support broad emergency powers
author: awprokop

text: Excited that the release date for this is coming up. Is it in galleys? I'd love an advance peek.
author: awprokop

text: Content idea: An article about how this week could be, at long last, the big Mueller week. Run it every week.
author: awprokop

text: Thread. Manafort NY state prosecution looks like a mess
author: awprokop

text: So deserved
author: awprokop
